data.market_trends: Eco-tourism is on the rise, with more travelers focusing on sustainable experiences in rural areas.
data.consumer_behavior: Travelers are increasingly utilizing online resources and travel apps to plan their trips.
data.competitive_landscape: Competitors include Central American countries focusing on eco-friendly tourism and luxury vacations.
data.seasonal_factors: Seasonal shifts affect the number of visitors, with peaks during holidays and lower numbers during the rainy season.
